src_original: evaṃ yāvaj jātyāṃ satyāṃ jarāmaraṇasyābhinirvṛttir bhavati /  tatrāvidyāyā naivaṃ bhavati /  ahaṃ saṃskārān abhinirvartayāmīti /  saṃskārāṇām apy evaṃ na bhavati /  vayam avidyayābhinirvṛttā iti /
tgt_original: 若無無明則不生行，若無生則無老死，如是有無明故有行增長，如是有生故有老死增長。

src_original: evaṃ yāvaj jātyā naivaṃ bhavati /  ahaṃ jarāmaraṇam abhinirvartayāmīti /  jarāmaraṇasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati /  ahaṃ jātyā nirvṛtta iti /
tgt_original: 其無明亦不念言我能造行、行亦不念言我為無明所造，乃至生亦不言我能造老死、老死亦不言我為生所造。

src_original: atha ca satyām avidyāyāṃ saṃskārāṇām abhinirvṛttir bhavati prādurbhāvaḥ /  evaṃ yāvaj jātyāṃ satyāṃ jarāmaraṇasyābhinirvṛttir bhavati prādurbhāvaḥ //

tgt_original: 此等四大所成，內孔即是空大，乃至成名色。

src_original: tatra ye rāgadveṣamohā viṣayeṣv amī ucyante saṃskārā iti /

src_original: manasikārasaṃprayuktaṃ mānasaṃ duṣkhaṃ daurmanasyam /  ye cānyae evamādaya upakleśās tae upāyāsāḥ // pe //

src_original: punar aparaṃ tatve 'pratipattiḥ mithyā pratipattiḥ ajñānam avidyā /  evam avidyāyāṃ satyāṃ trividhāḥ saṃskārāḥ abhinirvartante /  puṇyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ puṇyopagam eva vijñānaṃ bhavati /  apuṇyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇām apuṇyopagam eva vijñānaṃ bhavati /  āniñjyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇām āniñjyopagam eva vijñānaṃ bhavati /
